title: Archive Attribute Coercion
description: Archive Attribute Coercion of received/sent DIMSE

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the Archive Attribute Coercion

dicomDescription.title: Attribute Coercion Description
dicomDescription.description: Unconstrained text description of the Attribute Coercion

dcmURI.title: Attribute Coercion URI
dcmURI.description: Identifies Attribute Coercion by Uniform Resource Identifier (e.g. 'merge-mwl:${jboss.server.temp.url}/dcm4chee-arc/mwl2series.xsl')

dcmCoercionSufficient.title: Attribute Coercion Sufficient
dcmCoercionSufficient.description: Do not apply other matching Attribute Coercions of lesser priority, if this Attribute Coercion was applied effectively.

dcmCoercionOnFailure.title: Attribute Coercion on Failure
dcmCoercionOnFailure.description: Behavior on failure applying this Attribute Coercion. RETHROW (= propagate failure to operation applying this Attribute Coercion), CONTINUE (= continue to apply other matching Attribute Coercions of lesser priority) or SUFFICIENT (= do not apply other matching Attribute Coercions of lesser priority).

dcmRulePriority.title: Attribute Coercion Priority
dcmRulePriority.description: Rule Priority. Higher priority rule takes precedence.

dcmDIMSE.title: DIMSE
dcmDIMSE.description: DICOM Message Element on which this Attribute Coercion shall be applied

dicomTransferRole.title: DICOM Transfer Role
dicomTransferRole.description: DICOM Transfer Role of peer DICOM AE.

dcmSOPClass.title: SOP Class UID
dcmSOPClass.description: UID of SOP Class for which this Attribute Coercion shall be applied. Apply on any if absent.

dcmProperty.title: Condition
dcmProperty.description: Conditions in format (SendingHostname|SendingApplicationEntityTitle|ReceivingHostname|ReceivingApplicationEntityTitle|{AttributeTagOrKeyword[number]}|{SequenceTagOrKeyword.AttributeTagOrKeyword})[!]={regEx}. More than one value can be specified for a given attribute by separating them with a | symbol. Examples: SendingApplicationEntityTitle=FORWARD or Modality=MR|CT or ProcedureCodeSequence.CodeValue=MRProcedure or 00180015=KNEE or 00321034.00080100=RequestingServiceCode or ImageType[3]=LOCALIZER

dcmAttributeUpdatePolicy.title: Attribute Update Policy
dcmAttributeUpdatePolicy.description: Applied Attribute Update Policy. Only effective for coerce from Leading C-FIND SCP coercion type. Refer Attribute Update Policies' meanings

dcmSupplementFromDeviceReference.title: Device Name Coercion Parameter
dcmSupplementFromDeviceReference.description: Device Name Coercion Parameter. Only effective for particular Attribute Coercions.

dcmMergeAttribute.title: DICOM Attribute Coercion Parameter
dcmMergeAttribute.description: DICOM Attribute Coercion Parameters in format {attributeID}={value}. {attributeID} inside of {value} may be replaced by the value of that attribute in the original dataset. Only effective for particular Attribute Coercions.
